name: Natural Resources
pages: LimaTech adds 2 ores to the natural world generation. You'll have to do some digging to get your infrastructure going.

pages.title: Titanium
pages.text: Titanium is the first and most commonly used metal. It generates in the overworld in both the stone and deepslate layers, with higher concentrations towards the world floor. Practically everything uses this stuff: machines, weapons, tools. You can even make white dye with it. Neat.

pages.title: Niobium
pages.text: Niobium is a rarer metal used for high-end weaponry, machinery, and electronics. It generates sparsely in the outer End Islands. TIP: Niobium ore glows! Keep an eye out on the terrain.
